summary: A mod with 26 new weapons and shield.
descriptionHtml:
Hi everyone thank you for visit this is weapons only version of fantasy cities and weapons.
This is my first weapons mod too, i only use nifskope to make this.
this is the list of weapons include shield:
+Sins and Chaisten ( 1 handed blade )
+Seas Rage ( 2 handed spear )
+Justices ( 2 handed greatsword )
+Thorn ( 2 handed greatsword )
+Sunrays ( 1 handed sword )
+Dawn sun ( 2 handed greatsword )
+Eclipes ( 2 handed greatsword )
+Full Moon ( 2 handed greatsword )
+Moon Fangs ( 1 handed sword )
+Spear of Dark ( 2 handed spear )
+Spear of Light ( 2 handed spear )
+Fallen Angel ( 2 handed scythe )
+Golden Cross ( staff [stormcall])
+Night Lotus ( staff [paralyze])
+Wing of Victory ( 2 handed battle axe)
+Heaven Despair ( 2 handed greatsword )
+Reget ( 1 handed sword )
+Wind Hunter ( bow )(notice: dont drop the bow because it will disappear)
+Demon Blood (2 handed greatsword )
+Loses Wings (2 handed spear)
+Flower Heart ( shield )
+Angel Feathers ( shield )
+Sun Charms ( shield )
+Moon Claws ( shield )
+Algendash ( shield )
For some challenge i make 3 new craft item ( ingredient too lol which you can eat it and become superman):
+Sunlight shards
+Moonlight shards
+Asaster's mushroom (very rare which can give you a great healing rate)
Some weapon can combine by craft and become the most dangerous weapon in this mod.
You can craft weapon or steal from jarl if you have high sneak skill (but not all, some are craft only).
This version not recommend DLC.
If someone get problem with textures or weapon don't show in game so try to move your game to D/ directory sorry about this uncovenience.
If you like you can visit fantasy landscape only if you are love surrealism:))
I will update if there have any new weapons thank you for the visit.
author: congtuan999
